MoveInTheMap (the ultimate parent is <HuntTheWumpus)

Testing that the user can move around the map.

Input Map:
|Start| Direction | End|
|1| E |2|
|2| E |3|
|3| S |4|
|4| S |5|
|5| W |6|
|6| W |7|
|7| N |8|
|8| N |1|

Testing '''valid''' movements: >ValidMovement

Testing '''invalid''' movements: >InvalidMovement
